creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: couple in LLC, with woman in hooded cloak and man in top hat and overcoat with walking stick, huddled in LLC, on a narrow street at night, surrounded by ghostly figures and fantastic people; night sky with crescent moon, URC, with stars; smoke from chimney in URQ; restrike
inscription:
Signature, Edition and Inscription

below image, in pencil: [12/20  RESTRIKE FROM PLATE OF RICHARD HOLZSCHUH]; on back, in pencil: [RH070581]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [couple on night street surrounded by ghosts and fantastic figures]
